row.process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_PING_STATUS# = "" :SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_PACKETS_SENT# = "" :SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_PACKETS_RECEIVED# = "" :SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_MAX_ROUND_TRIP# = "" :SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_MIN_ROUND_TRIP# = "" :SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_AVG_ROUND_TRIP# = ""
: IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS", , "REP","UC4RB_PING*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_PING_PACKETS_SENT" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_PACKETS_SENT# = &VALUE# : ELSE : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_PING_PACKETS_RECEIVED" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_PACKETS_RECEIVED# = &VALUE# : ELSE : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_PING_MAX_ROUND_TRIP" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_MAX_ROUND_TRIP# = &VALUE# : ELSE : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_PING_MIN_ROUND_TRIP" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_MIN_ROUND_TRIP# = &VALUE# : ELSE : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_PING_AVG_ROUND_TRIP" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_AVG_ROUND_TRIP# = &VALUE# : ELSE : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_PING_STATUS" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_PING_STATUS# = &VALUE# : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_PACKETS_SENT#,,WORKFLOW :PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_PACKETS_RECEIVED#,,WORKFLOW :PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_MAX_ROUND_TRIP#,,WORKFLOW :PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_MIN_ROUND_TRIP#,,WORKFLOW :PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_AVG_ROUND_TRIP#,,WORKFLOW :PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_PING_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW
